Shivah::

Shivah blocked the signal of panzer in that way that Azure Blade 
couldn't speak with her. he open com link with Panzer and 
said "Welcome to Predacons, Panzer! I'm right now a bit busy but of 
course I have something to you. Follow this signal and help my 
sister, Kali -She has yours commands. Just a thing Panzer, I'm the 
second in rank and while the master back,  I'm in charge... But you 
shouldn't name me Commander... Not until we know if the master is 
alive. Do you have your weapons Panzer? "


--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> Panzer::
> 
> She woke up. Her optics brightened to thier full intensity.  She 
sat 
> up and looked around the room. She felt like she had just been made 
> and awakened for the first time. She stood up and opened her 
> commlink.  "Commander Shivah, I am ready for duty. Please send me 
my 
> orders." She stood there and reached for her sidearm, but found the 
> compartment was empty. "Hmmm, perhaps they have not issued me my 
> weapon yet."
